title: AI minister seeks new investments through visits to Germany, Saudi Arabia, India
description: OTTAWA — Artificial Intelligence Minister Evan Solomon is visiting Saudi Arabia and India after a trip to Germany as part of an effort to drum up new investment in Canadian tech.
content:
OTTAWA — Artificial Intelligence Minister Evan Solomon is visiting Saudi Arabia and India after a trip to Germany as part of an effort to drum up new investment in Canadian tech.

title: Hollywood groups condemn ByteDance's AI video generator
description: A new artificial intelligence video generator from Beijing-based ByteDance, the creator of TikTok, is drawing the ire of Hollywood organizations.
content: A new artificial intelligence video generator from Beijing-based ByteDance, the creator of TikTok, is drawing the ire of Hollywood organizations that say Seedance 2.0 “blatantly” violates copyright and uses the likeness of actors and others without p... [2425 chars]

title: RailTel Hosts AI-Driven Healthcare Panels At India AI Impact Summit 2026 In Delhi
description: RailTel Corporation of India curated and hosted two panel discussions on AI-driven healthcare at the AI Impact Summit 2026 in New Delhi. Experts discussed using artificial intelligence to strengthen public health systems, improve accessibility and ensure inclusive healthcare delivery.
content: RailTel Corporation of India Ltd., a Navratna CPSE under the Ministry of Railways curated and hosted two important panel discussions on Artificial Intelligence–driven healthcare at the AI Impact Summit 2026, held at Bharat Mandapam. The mega summit w... [3596 chars]

title: Britain's PM Keir Starmer announces new regulations on AI chatbots
description: The British government will add new regulations to artificial intelligence chatbots to protect kids, Prime Minister Keir Starmer announced Monday.
content:
Feb. 16 (UPI) -- The British government will add new regulations to artificial intelligence chatbots to protect children and other users, Prime Minister Keir Starmer announced Monday.

title: Michigan student sues university after being accused of using AI
description: A federal lawsuit alleges University of Michigan regents and faculty engaged in disability discrimination against a student accused by an instructor of using artificial intelligence to write papers.
content:
DETROIT (WWJ) -- A federal lawsuit alleges University of Michigan regents and faculty engaged in disability discrimination against a student accused by an instructor of using artificial intelligence to write papers.

title: 23 Ways Executives Are Using AI
description: From taking a seat at the table to eliminating busywork, founders are integrating artificial intelligence into all parts of their operations.
content: A recent Gallup survey of more than 23,000 U.S. workers showed that only 10 percent use AI daily, while 23 percent use it at least a few times per week. The survey, taken in the third quarter of 2025, found that 37 percent said their companies were u... [10062 chars]

title: AI must in real estate oversight as urban population heads to 80 crore by 2050: MoHUA
description: India’s real estate regulatory architecture must shift towards artificial intelligence-led oversight and machine-to-machine digital integration even as the country's urban population was projected to grow from 50 crore at present to nearly 80 crore by 2050, a senior official in the Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs (MoHUA) said.Addressing the 'National Urban and Real Estate Development Conclave' organised by the National Real Estate Development Council (NAREDCO) in the city, Kuldip Narayan, Joint Secretary, MoHUA, said, “Whether we like it or not, our urban population will cross 80 crore by 2050. We have to adapt, and carefully align our actions,” underscoring that more than half of the built-up space required by 2050 was yet to be constructed.
content: India’s real estate regulatory architecture must shift towards artificial intelligence-led oversight and machine-to-machine digital integration even as the country's urban population was projected to grow from 50 crore at present to nearly 80 crore b... [3170 chars]
